item.title: Monitoring Overview | KubeVault
item.description: New to KubeVault? Please start here. Monitoring KubeVault Components KubeVault operator has native support for monitoring via Prometheus. You can use builtin Prometheus scraper or Prometheus Operator to monitor KubeVault operator. This tutorial will show you how this monitoring works with KubeVault operator and how to enable them. Vault Server Metrics By default the KubeVault operator will configure each vault pod to publish statsd metrics. The KubeVault operator runs a statsd-exporter container as sidecar to convert and expose those metrics in Prometheus format.
